sentences.sContent: As the stereotypically thick-headed Irishman remarked when asked the way to the railway station: ‘‘Well, I wouldn't start from here.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the stereotypically thick-headed Irishman remarked when asked the way to the railway station: ‘‘Well, I wouldn't start from here.
sentences.sCn: 正如带有成见的愚蠢的爱尔兰人被问及通往火车站的道路时所谈论的：“好吧，我不回从这里出发。”
